statements.select: SELECT CA_ID AS Id,CA_DMA_ID AS DmaId,CA_ProductLine_Id AS ProductLineId,CA_OrderNo AS OrderNo,CA_CM_ID AS CmId,CA_OrderType AS OrderType,CA_OrderStatus AS OrderStatus,CA_IsActive AS IsActive,CA_StartDate AS StartDate,CA_EndDate AS EndDate,CA_Remark AS Remark,CA_CreateUser AS CreateUser,CA_CreateDate AS CreateDate,CA_UpdateUser AS UpdateUser,CA_UpdateDate AS UpdateDate,CA_CM_StartDate AS CmStartDate,CA_CM_EndDate AS CmEndDate FROM ConsignmentAuthorization CA_ID = #value#

SELECT CA_ID AS Id,CA_DMA_ID AS DmaId,CA_ProductLine_Id AS ProductLineId,CA_OrderNo AS OrderNo,CA_CM_ID AS CmId,CA_OrderType AS OrderType,CA_OrderStatus AS OrderStatus,CA_IsActive AS IsActive,CA_StartDate AS StartDate,CA_EndDate AS EndDate,CA_Remark AS Remark,CA_CreateUser AS CreateUser,CA_CreateDate AS CreateDate,CA_UpdateUser AS UpdateUser,CA_UpdateDate AS UpdateDate,CA_CM_StartDate AS CmStartDate,CA_CM_EndDate AS CmEndDate FROM ConsignmentAuthorization CA_ID=#Id#CA_DMA_ID=#DmaId#CA_ProductLine_Id=#ProductLineId#CA_OrderNo=#OrderNo#CA_CM_ID=#CmId#CA_OrderType=#OrderType#CA_OrderStatus=#OrderStatus#CA_IsActive=#IsActive#CA_StartDate=#StartDate#CA_EndDate=#EndDate#CA_Remark=#Remark#CA_UpdateUser=#UpdateUser#CA_UpdateDate=#UpdateDate#CA_CM_StartDate=#CmStartDate#CA_CM_EndDate=#CmEndDate#
statements.insert: INSERT INTO ConsignmentAuthorization (CA_ID,CA_DMA_ID,CA_ProductLine_Id,CA_OrderNo,CA_CM_ID,CA_OrderType,CA_OrderStatus,CA_IsActive,CA_StartDate,CA_EndDate,CA_Remark,CA_CreateUser,CA_CreateDate,CA_UpdateUser,CA_UpdateDate,CA_CM_StartDate,CA_CM_EndDate) VALUES(#Id#,#DmaId#,#ProductLineId#,#OrderNo#,#CmId#,#OrderType#,#OrderStatus#,#IsActive#,#StartDate:DateTime:1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM#,#EndDate:DateTime:1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM#,#Remark#,#CreateUser#,#CreateDate:DateTime:1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM#,#UpdateUser#,#UpdateDate:DateTime:1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM#,#CmStartDate:DateTime:1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM#,#CmEndDate:DateTime:1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM#)
